requests.response_body: {"indicators":[{"indicator_id":1,"indicator_group":"Deforestation","description":"Tree cover loss per year ({{years}}) at {{threshold}} threshold in units of hectares","unit":"hectares","type":"line"},{"indicator_id":2,"indicator_group":"Deforestation","description":"Tree cover loss per year ({{years}}) at {{threshold}} threshold in units of % of initial tree cover extent (TreeCov_UMD_2000) at the same threshold","unit":"%","type":"line"},{"indicator_id":3,"indicator_group":"Treecover Extent","description":"Tree cover extent according to UMD data at {{threshold}} threshold for the year 2000 in units of hectares","unit":"hectares","type":"number"},{"indicator_id":4,"indicator_group":"Stocks in 2000","description":"Aboveground biomass stocks according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year 2000","unit":"Tg","type":"pie"},{"indicator_id":5,"indicator_group":"Stocks in 2000","description":"Aboveground carbon stocks according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year 2000","unit":"Tg","type":"pie"},{"indicator_id":6,"indicator_group":"Stocks in 2000","description":"Belowground biomass stocks according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year 2000","unit":"Tg","type":"pie"},{"indicator_id":7,"indicator_group":"Stocks in 2000","description":"Belowground carbon stocks according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year 2000","unit":"Tg","type":"pie"},{"indicator_id":8,"indicator_group":"Stocks in 2000","description":"Total (above + belowground) biomass stocks according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year 2000","unit":"Tg","type":"pie"},{"indicator_id":9,"indicator_group":"Stocks in 2000","description":"Total (above + belowground) carbon stocks according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year 2000","unit":"Tg","type":"pie"},{"indicator_id":10,"indicator_group":"Biomass Density","description":"Aboveground live biomass density according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year 2000","unit":"Mg Biomass/ha","type":"pie"},{"indicator_id":11,"indicator_group":"Biomass Density","description":"Aboveground carbon density in live biomass according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year 2000","unit":"Mg Carbon/ha","type":"pie"},{"indicator_id":12,"indicator_group":"Carbon Emissions","description":"Aboveground biomass loss according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year ({{year}}) in units of Tg biomass","unit":"Tg biomass","type":""},{"indicator_id":13,"indicator_group":"Carbon Emissions","description":"Aboveground biomass loss according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year ({{year}}) in units of Tg carbon","unit":"Tg C","type":"line"},{"indicator_id":14,"indicator_group":"Carbon Emissions","description":"Carbon emissions from aboveground biomass loss according to Woods Hole data at ({{threshold}}) in the year ({{year}}) in units of Mt CO2","unit":"MtC02","type":"line"},{"indicator_id":15,"indicator_group":"Deforestation","description":"Net forest area change per year","unit":"hectares","type":"line"},{"indicator_id":16,"indicator_group":"Deforestation","description":"Net forest area change per year as a % of 2000 forest area","unit":"%","type":"line"},{"indicator_id":17,"indicator_group":"Treecover Extent","description":"Forest extent in the year 2000 according to FAO FRA2015","unit":"hectares","type":"number"},{"indicator_id":18,"indicator_group":"Stocks in 2000","description":"Aboveground biomass stocks in the year 2000 according to FAO FRA2015","unit":"Tg","type":"pie"},{"indicator_id":19,"indicator_group":"Stocks in 2000","description":"Aboveground carbon stocks in the year 2000 according to FAO FRA2015","unit":"Tg C","type":"pie"},{"indicator_id":20,"indicator_group":"Stocks in 2000","description":"Belowground biomass stocks in the year 2000 according to FAO FRA2015","unit":"Tg","type":"pie"},{"indicator_id":21,"indicator_group":"Stocks in 2000","description":"Belowground carbon stocks in the year 2000 according to FAO FRA2015","unit":"Tg C","type":"pie"},{"indicator_id":22,"indicator_group":"Stocks in 2000","description":"Total living biomass stocks in the year 2000 according to FAO FRA2015","unit":"Tg","type":"pie"},{"indicator_id":23,"indicator_group":"Stocks in 2000","description":"Total living carbon stocks in the year 2000 according to FAO FRA2015","unit":"Tg C","type":"pie"},{"indicator_id":24,"indicator_group":"Biomass Density","description":"Aboveground biomass density in the year 2000 according to FAO FRA2015","unit":"Mg Biomass/ha","type":"pie"},{"indicator_id":25,"indicator_group":"Biomass Density","description":"Aboveground carbon density in live biomass in the year 2000 according to FAO FRA2015","unit":"Mg Carbon/ha","type":"pie"},{"indicator_id":26,"indicator_group":"Biomass Density","description":"Belowground biomass density in the year 2000 according to FAO FRA2015","unit":"Mg Biomass/ha","type":""},{"indicator_id":27,"indicator_group":"Biomass Density","description":"Belowground carbon density in live biomass in the year 2000 according to FAO FRA2015","unit":"Mg Carbon/ha","type":""},{"indicator_id":28,"indicator_group":"Carbon Emissions","description":"Biomass loss from living biomass (above- and belowground) FAOSTAT in Tg","unit":"Tg biomass","type":""},{"indicator_id":29,"indicator_group":"Carbon Emissions","description":"Carbon loss from living biomass (above- and belowground) FAOSTAT in Tg C","unit":"TgC","type":"line"},{"indicator_id":30,"indicator_group":"Carbon Emissions","description":"Carbon loss from living biomass (above- and belowground) FAOSTAT in Mt CO2","unit":"Mt CO2","type":"line"},{"indicator_id":31,"indicator_group":"Deforestation","description":"Deforestation rate per year in other national dataset","unit":"ha","type":"line"},{"indicator_id":32,"indicator_group":"Deforestation","description":"Deforestation rate per year as a % of 2000 forest area in other national C","type":"line"},{"indicator_id":35,"indicator_group":"Carbon Emissions","description":"Carbon emissions from aboveground biomass loss according to other national data in units of Mt CO2","unit":"Mt CO2","type":"line"},{"indicator_id":36,"indicator_group":"Soil carbon stocks","description":"Soil organic carbon stocks according to World Harmonized Soil Database","unit":"Tg C","type":"no-chart"},{"indicator_id":37,"indicator_group":"Soil carbon density","description":"Soil organic carbon density according to World Harmonized Soil Database","unit":"Mg carbon/ha","type":"no-chart"},{"indicator_id":38,"indicator_group":"Biomass Density","description":"Belowground biomass density in the year 2000 according to Woods Hole data","unit":"Mg Biomass/ha","type":"no-chart"},{"indicator_id":39,"indicator_group":"Biomass Density","description":"Belowground carbon density in live biomass in the year 2000 according to Woods Hole data","unit":"Mg carbon/ha","type":"no-chart"},{"indicator_id":40,"indicator_group":"drivers","description":"name of driver","type":"text"},{"indicator_id":41,"indicator_group":"drivers","description":"net area of expansion (+) or contraction (-) of cropland between 2000 and 2013","unit":"ha","type":"text"},{"indicator_id":42,"indicator_group":"drivers","description":"name of crop","type":"text"},{"indicator_id":43,"indicator_group":"drivers","unit":"%","type":"line"},{"indicator_id":44,"indicator_group":"drivers","unit":"%","type":"line"}]}
requests.curl:
curl "http://gfwc-staging.herokuapp.com/api/indicators" -X GET \
	-H "Accept: application/json; application/gfwc-v1+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
	-H "Host: gfwc-staging.herokuapp.com" \
	-H "Cookie: "
